article.headline: Morgan St. 67, VMI 62
article.story: BALTIMORE -- Kevin Thompson scored 18 points on perfect 9-for-9 shooting and Morgan State defeated Virginia Military Institute 67-62 on Saturday. Rodney Stokes added 16 points and 11 rebounds as the Bears snapped the Keydets' three-game winning streak while establishing a three-game streak of their own. VMI (15-12) led 35-34 at halftime, but wasn't able to build much on it. Austin Kenon, who led the Keydets with 18 points, hit two free throws with 16:49 left to give VMI its biggest lead at 40-36. The Bears (13-10) answered with nine straight points and kept the lead until expanding it to seven, 61-54, on Larry Bastfield's jumper with 4:19 to go. The Keydets made one last push, scoring five straight to cut the gap to 61-59 on D.J. Covington's free throw with 24 seconds left. Aric Brooks answered with four free throws and Bastfield two to close out VMI.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
